title: Dead Sexy
description: Looking to spice up his marriage, Detective Ronan Oâ€™Mara assumes the guise of a construction worker, hard hat included, and rings his own doorbell, confident his husband will play along.Psychic Tennyson Grimm is enjoying a rare day off. He finds himself a little more than annoyed when his planned day of pampering is seemingly interrupted by a stranger at the door.Rolling with the punches, Tennyson soon finds himself in the expert hands of the construction worker who has a voice like a used car salesman and a body made for sin.Dead Sexy is a 6,000-word SHORT STORY and was a featured submission in the Red Hot Summer M/M Romance Giveaway.
author: Pandora Pine
